HEADER.TITLE:
Hey, I’m Jose Romero.
 Front-end developer 
 Based in Barcelona, ES.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Right now, I’ve just launched this minimal portfolio template you're viewing. I'm also working on my own projects, sharing my thoughts on my blog and I document my whole journey.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION_PROJECTS: Ideas turned into code. Small projects where I experiment, learn, and bring new solutions to life.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION_ARTICLES: Thoughts, experiences, and lessons about life, technology, fitness, and everything that inspires me to keep growing.
HEADER.DESCRIPTION_TEMPLATES: Templates created in Notion to help you organize your life, focus on what's important, and build your best self.

PROJECTS.TITLE: Projects
PROJECTS.PROJECT_1_DESCRIPTION: A clean and fast running tracker to log distance, pace, and time — built for simplicity and focus.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_2_DESCRIPTION: WA minimalist weather app showing real-time forecasts and clear visuals for any location.
PROJECTS.PROJECT_3_DESCRIPTION: A simple and effective task manager to organize daily goals and stay productive.
